meanings.definition: Lacking in thrift or economical management; wasteful.
meanings.sent1: She was so thriftless with her money, always spending it without thinking.
meanings.sent2: His thriftless habits led to financial troubles.
meanings.sent3: The thriftless squirrel spent all its nuts in one day!
meanings.sent4: Her thriftless ways left her with an empty piggy bank.
meanings.sent5: The thriftless behavior of the character served as a cautionary tale in the story.

meanings.definition: Lacking in thrift or economy; extravagant or prodigal.
meanings.sent1: The thriftless shopper bought everything she saw without considering the cost.
meanings.sent2: Their thriftless lifestyle left them in debt.
meanings.sent3: The thriftless party planner went over budget yet again.
meanings.sent4: His thriftless spending was like water flowing through his fingers.
meanings.sent5: The thriftless king bankrupted his kingdom with his lavish expenditures.
